title: Paarvai Undhan Lyrics Nil Gavani Sellathey Song lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Vasundhara Das, Sricharan
Song: Paarvai Undhan
Movie : Nil Gavani Sellathey
Lyrics : Na Muthukumar

Thozhil un thozhil nan sayum anneram
Nenjil en nenjil perinbam undagum
Anbe un anbil nan vazhum inneram
Ayyo ippodhey sethaalum santhosam

Paarvai Undhan paarvai, kulir eeram adhu porvai
Un kangal en kannil vandhu kadhal solla

Let me take you in my arms
Dont you know that i am a charm
Got to taste that mood a ride
Get my ring and be my queen

Vaarthai undhan vaarthai
Adhu vaarthai illai vazhkai
Un kaigal enkaiyil vandhu vetpam solla

Cant live without my soul
i know my love is gold
Your love never gets old

Un perai sollum podhey edho mayakkam
Kanmoodi solli parthaen dhinandhorum
Un kobam konjam unndu adada enakkum
Un munbu kobam kooda parandhodum

Thozhil un thozhil nan sayum anneram
Nenjil en nenjil perinbam undagum
Anbe un anbil nan vazhum inneram
Ayyo ippodhey sethaalum santhosam

He is me last word
That has to be her
Wont you give me a life
Just be my wife
Let me take you in my arms
Dont you know that i am a charm
Got to taste that mood a ride
Get my ring and be my queen

Cant live without my soul
i know my love is gold
Your love never gets old

Unnodu pesapesa neram innikum
Silaneram mounam kooda azhagagum
Un meedhu asaipatu idhayam thudikkum
Un munbu acham nanam thadumarum

Unnal nan unnal kathadi polahnen
Munnal un munnal aengengo nan ponen
Illai ne illai endral nan ennaven
Ayyo appodhey angae nan saven

Paarvai Undhan paarvai, kulir eeram adhu porvai
Un kangal en kannil vandhu kadhal solla
